Setting up HHVM¶

On CentOS7 / CloudLinux7¶

Run the following script /opt/nDeploy/scripts/easy_hhvm_setup.sh

Note

XtendWeb does not support HHVM backend on CentOS6/CloudLinux6

Note

CloudLinux limits does not work with HHVM
